post:
well i can tell you this story :) 
When I started the quivalent of highschool in my country, I'd decided that I didn't want to fall in love AT ALL. I had had too much heartbreak (for example: you're not thin enough to be my gf sorry). So well I started talling with this guy that was in my class and he was my bestfriend. Really I felt so good with him but remember, I didn't want any relationship so I decided that I wasn't in love. 
A couple months later, I was talking with his bestfriend (C), who became mine later, and she told my that he had told her that he really liked a girl in his class with whom he was talking a lot. I thought a bit about that and I realized I was the only girl in our class with who he was talking. 
A couple weeks after, I was still thinking about that and I realized that I was in total love with him. 
So, of course, I told my now bestfriend (C) something like "Fuck I think I am in love with him", to what she answered "Fuck, he is in love with you too" 
At this moment, she decided to tell him, so that he will have the guts to ask me out. 
He dared 
We are happily together for nearly 2 years 3
(sorry for the not so perfect english, i'm not a native speaker ^^')

Okay so once i was in the traim and these two teenagers were im front of me (a guy and a girl). I think they hadn't seen eachother for a while. So the guy was like hey how are you doing blablabla and then he asks the girl "hey are you still witg your boyfriend btw ?"
Answer from the girl: "Oh no he cheated on me so i cheated on him with two guys... at the same time"

It makes everybody laugh so hard when i tell them about this

Hi ! I live in Switzerlnd and I'm in the equivalent of highschool.  We have something like an essay of 20pages about a problematic that we chose: i chose internet addiction in people that are between 15 and 2 years old.  I made a survey and I really need more people to answer to it. Thank you very much for answering to it if you are between 15 and 20 years old.  [https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1ORqz6pEA6rzPIXoyFR5s55EhR36y5GousUzdHYuaxPQ/edit](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1ORqz6pEA6rzPIXoyFR5s55EhR36y5GousUzdHYuaxPQ/edit) 

By the way, if you are a big internet addict or were and you are ok to be interviewed, just tell me. It would be great 

Thank you so much everone
